name: Bob the Frog
description:
Challenge yourself in this new super addictive and creative game! Completely free, try to reach the highest score by jumping around on the water flowers.

The rules are simple:
• Jump on the good flowers to move forward
• Avoid the black flowers
• Reach the HIGHEST score you can!
• No time limit

How far can you go? Get Bob the Frog now, and find out your limits in the most downloaded game of the month!
